channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WordPress Slider Block Gutenslider
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WordPress Slider Block Gutenslider

item.title: CVE-2021-24640|2024-08-03T19:35:20.417Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20slider%20block%20gutenslider
item.description: The WordPress Slider Block Gutenslider plugin before 5.2.0 does not escape the minWidth attribute of a Gutenburg block, which could allow users with a role as low as contributor to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks
